secret_rule: Only items that are used in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "notebook" and "pencil".

Based on the examples provided—"notebook" and "pencil"—a possible rule for the game "Guess the Rule Games" might be that you can only bring items that are related to writing or items typically found in a classroom or office setting related to writing and note-taking. These are items that you would typically use to write or take notes.
